recipesJson.name: Sacrum’s Jello Cake
recipesJson.author: wolfwheeler
recipesJson.description:
Per request. 

MB Classic Sponge and FLV Pound Cake for a nice, buttery cake base.

INW Shisha Strawberry and WF Boysenberry Raspberry for the “red” fruit flavor.

CAP Jelly Candy for some jello consistently.

FA Marshmallow to do double duty. Boosting that goo with CAP Jelly Candy and helping to thicken the cream topping.

WF Buttercream Frosting for buttercream frosting.

Finally, WF Strawberry Gummy Candy to add to the red and give more texture to the jello.

I don’t know what jello cake is or why anyone would want it, but it has been described to me like this.
